extension.description: A field of liquid that deforms realistically to changes in height using actual physics equations. Asteron: This code is adapted from a project I did for a graphics course in 2000. In beta testing this has garnered a lot of praise and I hope for it to replace cpBlobs as the most popular screensaver.
Dit is een zeer fascinerende screensaver. Je kunt ongeloofelijk veel verschillende patronen bekomen.
